titlestmt.titleproper: Records Relating to the Publication, Arizona's Heritage - Today and Tomorrow, 1972, October
Records Relating to the Publication, Arizona's Heritage - Today and Tomorrow, 1972, October

did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Records Relating to the Publication, Arizona's Heritage - Today and Tomorrow, 1972, October
did.abstract: Typescript correspondence, reports and background material. Includes material on historic sites and preservation, various nation-wide historical societies and Tucson historic zones. A research report prepared by The University of Arizona for the Arizona Academy.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: It is the responsibility of the user to obtain permission to publish from the owner of the copyright (the institution, the creator of the record, the author or his/her transferees, heirs, legates, or literary executors). The user agrees to indemnify and hold harmless the Arizona Board of Regents for the University of Arizona, its officers, employees, and agents from and against all claims made by any person asserting that he or she is an owner of copyright.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Records Relating to the Publication, Arizona's Heritage - Today and Tomorrow, 1972, October (AZ 289). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired as gift of the editor, Harwood P. Hinton, 1973.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Typescript correspondence, reports and background material. Includes material on historic sites and preservation, various nation-wide historical societies and Tucson historic zones. Also includes copy of final printed report.

relatedmaterial.p: Published as: Twenty-first Arizona Town Hall on Arizona's Heritage -- today and tomorrow: research report, recommendations, and list of participants. Phoenix: Arizona Academy, 1972.
